entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who received the prophecy, and Harry's father. The text states 'he was the one the prophecy was made to'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has to finish off Voldemort according to the prophecy. The text states 'it looks like I'm the one who's got to finish off Voldemort'.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one Harry has to finish off according to the prophecy. The text states 'it looks like I'm the one who's got to finish off Voldemort'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who was punched by the telescope. The text states 'I squeezed it and it – it punched me!'

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as shouting Hermione's name along with Harry. The text states 'Hermione!' shouted Harry and Ron;

relationships.description: Dumbledore received the prophecy, which was made for him to tell Harry. The text states 'he was the one the prophecy was made to'.
Voldemort is Harry's enemy, as stated in the prophecy. The text states 'it looks like I'm the one who's got to finish off Voldemort'.
Hermione was punched by the telescope. The text states 'I squeezed it and it – it punched me!'
